name: UP889131 - Soulless
description:
Team 4

Soulless

Take on the role of a ghost, fresh into the afterlife on a (very short) quest to reclaim their humanity!

Controls

All controls are remappable through Unity's interface

SPACE - Jump

A/D - Left/Right

Mouse 1 - Shoot (If powered up)
